subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After N.F.L. owners decided in 2008 to opt out of the collective bargaining agreement, the Eagles realized the 2011 free-agency period could present an extraordinary buyer’s market.
snippet: After N.F.L. owners decided in 2008 to opt out of the collective bargaining agreement, the Eagles realized the 2011 free-agency period could present an extraordinary buyer’s market.
